trends: There has been one other sighting in Newport
There were no other sightings in Newport on or around June 22nd 2012
divs: Sighting Details1.Me and my friend were up on the hill behind my house. we were just sitting up there talking. 2. The plane the was going east it shot up out of the trees. 3. I knew it was a UFO right when I saw it. 4. The object was larger than a Subaru car, it was pulsating red, whit and green lights. It was moving back and forth it did this like five times and then just disappeared. 5. When I saw it at first I was like cool, awesome. My feelings were excited and really happy. After the sighting I was really scared because we were hearing noises right behind us and we saw it again passing over the place where we were on the hill behind my house. 6. I lost sight of it because it just disappeared in to thin air both times we saw it.
Summary: it was very bright red green and white and larger than even a car
